# 2008 Jade Solid Gold Awards

The 2008 Jade Solid Gold Best Ten Music Awards Presentation () was held on January 3, 2009, at the Kowloon Hong Kong International Trade and Exhibition Centre. It is part of the Jade Solid Gold Best Ten Music Awards Presentation series.
Top 10 song awards
The top 10 songs (十大勁歌金曲) of 2008 are as follows.
